On the 480 vs + on larger screens i imagine larger is better and i always download the largest version in the end.. But the funimation rips are good and have been series i haven't started because they were subbed. so yay ^_^

moose is because most anime are upscales there days, the only true 1080p anime that funimation ever release were, Yu YU Hakusho and Freezing thats about it.
everything else is either mastered at 540p or upscaled to 1080p

@Daww i agree with you for the comment because its still the same show/great uploads but yeah it feels greater to have a nice resolutions for funimations anime especially when they say bd rip on it but its still great

Im not saying he is wrong for uploading bluray. I could care less whatever he uploads im going to download as long as its dubbed. Just i noticed teh 480 went so fast . I had them loaded on my ps3 and downloaded in under a half an hour for both series. While the blu ray takes all night and then another like 14 hours to load on the ps3.

Yeah moose sorry if i sounded like i was saying your opinion wasn't correct or something, I don't mean it like that.
I have so far liked 90% of what Daman has uploaded smaller res or not doesn't matter to me when the anime uploaded is so good, I can pickup a higher res later.

I just don't like to ramble on much about what does or doesn't get uploaded being as he is doing us a great service by sharing with us anything he does. ^_^

Daww i couldnt agree more. You are totally right everything he has done so far is awesome. Maybe i have been asking for too much lately but now im done with all these amazing animes and want more lol. O well whatever he decides to put up next im sure it will be awesome. Just watched more Im into it. I dont really like the whole memory loss angle. Other then that its a really good anime. There hasnt been a really good one in a while so im happy.
